divs: sighting detailsin 1995-1996 i was working in the hayward california area at the time and had a habit of taking my afternoon breaks outdoors, weather permitting, where i would watch and try to identify aircraft coming and going at the nearby hayward airport. the event happened one day as i was taking my customary afternoon break. the weather that day was sunny and clear, with some high clouds in the distance. as i watched the small civilian aircraft (i.e., cessnas, etc.) flying to and from the airport, i became aware of another craft that appeared to hover above\near the airport, roughly 1000 feet above the air traffic. it was cigar-shaped, so at first i thought it might be a blimp, but then i noticed that the afternoon sun would glint off of it every so often, as though it was highly polished. it was silver and highly reflective, like a shiny chrome car bumper. i then thought that maybe it was a helicopter, but realized it was too large and the wrong shape. on top of all that, the object seemed completely silent. about that time i called a co-worker to come outside to have a look, but before he came out the object suddenly shot straight up into the high clouds in a split second. i know what i saw was solid as it reflected sunlight. i am also very familiar with the flight characteristics of both fixed and rotary wing aircraft, as i am an faa-certified aircraft mechanic. i have seen fighter jets at airshows perform spectacular stunts, but i can tell you that what i saw that afternoon far exceeded the capabilities of any aircraft i have ever seen. this thing accelerated from zero to thousands of miles an hour in an instant, and it did so vertically from a hover.
